oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Selections from Eddy Arnold's Folk Song Book album - 1963-10-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances of Cotton Fields, Blowin In The Wind, Poor Howard, and It Comes And Goes from Eddy Arnold's album, Folk Song Book. Performers include Eddy Arnold (vocals), Chet Atkins (guitar), Ray Edenton (guitar), Jerry Kennedy (guitar), Henry Strzelecki (bass), Harold Bradley (drums), Layne (vibes), and the Needmore Creek Singers (background vocals). Produced by Chet Atkins, engineered by Bill Porter, and recorded on October 10, 1963 at RCA Victor Studio in Nashville, Tenn.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Eddy Arnold performs "Cotton Fields" / (2:45) Eddy Arnold performs "Blowin In The Wind / (5:54) Eddy Arnold performs "Poor Howard" / (8:13) Eddy Arnold performs "It Comes And Goes"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Atkins, Chet, 1924-2001; Edenton, Ray; Kennedy, Jerry, 1940-; Strzelecki, Henry (Henry P.), 1939-; Bradley, Harold (Guitarist); Needmore Creek Singers; Porter, Bill; RCA Studio B
